name: Doki Doki Despair
storyline: WARNING: This mod may contain disturbing scenes for some people, if you have anxiety or depression I recommend not playing.
summary: Doki Doki Despair is a dark and intense mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that takes the game to a new level of psychological horror. Inspired by elements of horror and mystery, the mod transforms the literature club experience into a journey of despair, where the player is thrown into a distorted and oppressive reality.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: MC Hate's His Life!!!!!(DDLC Despair MOD)(Both Ending's)
